snippet: Mike Berland, a political pollster and corporate crisis manager, has written a diet book that he says will help people win the campaign against fat.
abstract: Regan Arts is set to publish Mike Berland book Become a Fat-Burning Machine: Lose the Belly, End Sugar Cravings, Gain Energy; Berland, political pollster and crisis manager, lost nearly 70 pounds and recently completed Ironman World Championship triathlon.
